turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Good afternoon, how can I help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I need to order a pick up from Starbucks on Black Forest Drive.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure thing. what would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: a tall caramel macchiato with whole milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: would you like any whipped cream or syrups?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: So that's a tall caramel macchiato with whipped cream from the starbucks on black forest drive.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and you said skim milk right?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Whole milk. very different, my apologies.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great. Your order will be ready in 15 minutes and you'll get the reciept via mobile.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: no problem, have a good day.
